import torch

l2v = LLM2Vec.from_pretrained(
    "meta-llama/Meta-Llama-3-8B",
    device_map="cuda" if torch.cuda.is_available() else "cpu",
    torch_dtype=torch.bfloat16,
)

l2v.save("Llama-3-8B-Emb")
